title: What is the deal with the \View\" project on Front Street?  It would have seemed preferable to leave the old Wachovia building standing as opposed to the unsightly hole."
text:
As with all construction and development in this economy, things are
moving slow. Here is the link to the site itself, which reports
construction will begin in early 2010.

http://www.wilmingtondowntown.com/go/the-view-on-water-street1
